author: Megan duBois
title: Mobile menu
text:
I've been going on cruises for over 10 years, so I have some tips for first-time cruisers . Book directly through a cruise line and reconsider drink packages to save money. I've been on dozens of cruises in the past 10 years, and I've learned a lot about the best ways to sail .
Here are my best tips for someone booking their first cruise .
Take the time to choose the right cruise line and ship for you Not all cruise lines are the same. Some, like Disney Cruise Line , showcase beloved characters and have mostly family-friendly activities.
Others, like Norwegian Cruise Line , target cruisers looking for a more upscale and modern cruise ship with plenty to do for adults and older teens.
To find the right cruise line, consider what you want to do on the ship and the types of travelers you want to sail with.
Then, narrow down to the right ship by looking at what each offers. Also, consider your budget and what type of stateroom you'll want to book .
Book your cruise by calling the cruise line directly to get the best deal In my experience, the best way to get deals is to call the cruise line directly to book your sailing.
Although you may have seen some deals on the cruise line's website, people working in the booking center can see every deal you're eligible for at once.
Because of that, they can see which offer will save you the most money.
For example, on a recent sailing with Carnival, I saw discounts on standard balcony rooms online. When I called, an employee told me I was also eligible for a discount through the casino because of my spending on a previous sailing.
I'd had no idea, and the latter was the better deal for me and my family.
Join a Facebook group for your cruise After you book your cruise, try to find the appropriate Facebook group for your sailing.
You can do that by using the search bar and typing in the ship's name and the dates of your sailing, like \"Norwegian Prima, December 2-5, 2022.\"
If you can't find one, consider starting one yourself.
The groups are a fun way to meet other people who are going to be on your sailing. They're also a great place to ask questions about the trip.
I've learned a lot from lurking in these groups.
Try to explore the ship online before you leave your house All major cruise lines have ship models online that guests can virtually explore before getting to the terminal.
This is a great tool to use to learn where your stateroom is, what's around it, and which activities are on the ship.
Usually, you can explore the ship floor-by-floor, and if you click on a restaurant, lounge, or something else, a small description of the space will pop up so you can learn more about it.
Book the port excursions you want to do ahead of time Booking a port excursion before getting on the ship is the best way to secure your spot on tours and fun activities.
Many people will book excursions on the ship, and the lines at the port desk can get very long, especially as more people arrive.
You may also want to consider booking excursions with reliable third-party vendors that have good reviews online and don't take you too far from the pier.
All-inclusive beach days are a great option to book with third-party groups because most beaches are just a short walk or taxi ride away from the ship.
The downside to booking excursions that are not through the cruise line is that if you are late getting back, the ship will not wait for you, and you could be left in an unfamiliar port city.
The best bet to not get left behind is to leave the excursion or beach at least an hour and a half before the ship's departure time.
Try to get to the departure city at least a day early One of the biggest stress-relieving tips for cruising is getting to your cruise's departure city at least a day early.
This will help you board the ship on time and relieve some travel stress regarding delayed flights on the day your ship sets sail.
Arriving a day early will add to your overall vacation cost, so be sure to budget for an extra night at a hotel and food for the extra day.
Always pack a carry-on bag for the first day of the cruise When boarding a cruise ship, you don't carry your larger suitcases with you.
On embarkation day, staterooms typically aren't ready until later in the afternoon, and luggage can arrive well after dinner.
Because of this, I recommend bringing a carry-on bag for the first day of your cruise.
I usually suggest bringing a swimsuit so you can enjoy the pool, plus any charging cords, medications, and sunscreen you may need.
Really, really consider if drink packages are worth it Most cruise lines offer drink packages that can draw you in with the idea that you pay a flat fee once and get over a dozen alcoholic beverages in one day.
But I suggest crunching some numbers to decide if the packages will be worth it for you. For many packages, you need to drink seven or eight cocktails a day to break even.
On most cruise lines, everyone in your stateroom has to order the drink package to deter people from sharing drinks with others.
Drink packages are priced per day and must be bought for the entirety of a cruise. So, on a seven-night cruise, you must buy a seven-night drink package.
But you can also check if the drink package includes specialty coffee or milkshakes, which can help offset the cost.

author: 网易
title: 东契奇自加盟湖人以来得分助攻等六大核心数据全队第一|三分命中率|卢卡·东契奇_网易订阅
text:
雷速体育3月20日讯 自上个月加盟湖人以来，卢卡·东契奇共出战了15场比赛，其场均出场34.5分钟，可以得到26.2分8.8个篮板8.1次助攻1.9次抢断，场均还命中3.3个三分。
根据最新数据统计，东契奇在得分、篮板、助攻、抢断、三分球命中数以及正负值（plus-minus）这几项数据均领跑全队。

author: VNExplorer
title: Ten people rescued from plane crash site in remote Northwest Territories
text:
Ten people rescued from plane crash site in remote Northwest Territories
YELLOWKNIFE — The military says a rescue is complete after a plane crash left 10 people, some with injuries, stranded overnight in a remote area of the Northwest Territories.
David Lavellee, a spokesman with 1 Canadian Air Division and Canadian Norad Region Headquarters, says everyone has been extracted from the crash site and taken to the nearby Diavik diamond mine.
The Joint Rescue Coordination Centre Trenton started a search-and-rescue operation Wednesday after an Air Tindi Otter aircraft landed about 16 kilometres southeast of the mine.
A Royal Canadian Air Force Hercules aircraft flew from Winnipeg and arrived in the area Wednesday evening.
Three search-and-rescue technicians, who are highly trained first response and survival experts, parachuted to the site with supplies and equipment.
The president of Air Tindi, Chris Reynolds, says three helicopters were sent this morning to pick up the people at the scene and they were to be transported to Yellowknife.
This report by The Canadian Press was first published Dec. 28, 2023.
The Canadian Press

author: 小浪财讯
title: 双创50ETF（159782）跌0.56%，半日成交额400.50万元|双创_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，双创50ETF（159782）跌0.56%，报0.536元，成交额400.50万元。双创50ETF（159782）重仓股方面， 宁德时代 截止午盘跌1.13%， 中芯国际 跌0.23%， 汇川技术 跌0.05%， 迈瑞医疗 跌1.30%， 海光信息 跌0.68%， 寒武纪 涨0.31%， 阳光电源 跌2.96%， 澜起科技 涨1.02%， 中际旭创 涨3.03%， 中微公司 涨0.63%。
双创50ETF（159782）业绩比较基准为中证科创创业50指数收益率，管理人为银华基金管理股份有限公司，基金经理为王帅，成立（2021-06-29）以来回报为-46.11%，近一个月回报为0.17%。
风险提示：市场有风险，投资需谨慎。本文为AI大模型自动发布，任何在本文出现的信息（包括但不限于个股、评论、预测、图表、指标、理论、任何形式的表述等）均只作为参考，不构成个人投资建议。

author: @rtlinfo
title: C3: L'OM s'accroche à son rêve d'Europe
text: Admirable de courage et porté par le tumulte du Stade Vélodrome, l'OM est parvenu, au bout de ses forces, à se qualifier jeudi pour les demi-finales de la Ligue Europa et à donner un sens à sa fin de saison en éliminant Benfica aux tirs au but (1-0 a.p., 4 tab à 2, défaite 2-1 à l'aller).C'est l'Europe qui a maintenu l'OM en vie tout au long de cette pénible saison et qui a évité qu'elle soit un désastre de A à Z. Finalement, c'est encore l'Europe qui pourrait permettre à Marseille d'en sortir par le haut. Car la Ligue Europa continue pour l'OM, avec une double confrontation à venir face à l'Atalanta Bergame, ouverte et qui peut permettre de rêver à une nouvelle finale européenne après celles de 1991, 1993, 1999, 2004 et 2018.Pour l'OM, les ennuis avaient commencé dès le mois d'août avec une séance de tirs au but ratée contre le Panathinaïkos en barrage de Ligue des Champions. L'entraîneur s'appelait encore Marcelino et, depuis, les crises, les blessures, les catastrophes et les changements de coach se sont enchaînés.Mais jeudi, la terrible séance a cette fois tourné dans le bon sens avec cinq frappes parfaites côté marseillais et deux ratés pour les Portugais, dans un vacarme de légende. Angel Di Maria a frappé sur le poteau et Antonio Silva a buté sur Pau Lopez, qui s'était un jour qualifié de "nul" dans l'exercice.- Encore du bricolage -Le gardien espagnol a d'ailleurs été l'un des grands hommes de cette qualification, avec plusieurs arrêts déterminants, quand il fallait laisser l'OM en vie.Car même si le Vélodrome poussait très fort, comme le mistral du jour, Marseille n'avait toujours pas marqué à la pause et était virtuellement éliminé.Pendant ces 45 premières minutes, la prestation marseillaise a été plutôt bonne, mais l'OM a été rattrapé par le souci qui le poursuit depuis le début de saison: un manque de qualité offensive vraiment rédhibitoire à ces hauteurs.Iliman Ndiaye a ainsi eu la première belle occasion du match (7e), mais il n'a ensuite plus fait la moindre différence, alors qu'Amine Harit, perdu dans ses mauvais choix depuis des semaines désormais, a tout fait de travers.Benfica de son côté s'est longtemps contenté de surveiller Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, seul joueur offensif marseillais à avoir vraiment le but dans la tête, et de lancer quelques contres.A la pause, la sortie de Chancel Mbemba a ensuite obligé Jean-Louis Gasset, Monsieur bricolage, à rebâtir une fois de plus sa défense, l'OM se retrouvant avec sur les côtés un gamin de 18 ans, Emran Soglo, et Amir Murillo, un joueur de complément qui n'avait pas joué depuis trois mois à cause d'une blessure.- Moumbagna buteur -Marseille pourtant a tenu le coup et a même joué un peu plus haut, s'offrant plusieurs occasions, gâchées encore par trop d'imprécision technique. Mais tout cela confirmait que les Portugais n'étaient pas des terreurs.Il a d'ailleurs suffi d'un coup enfin joué avec justesse pour les faire céder quand Aubameyang, bien lancé par Jordan Veretout, a débordé et posé un centre parfait sur la tête de Faris Moumbagna (1-0, 79e).Le Camerounais a encore eu deux possibilités de qualifier l'OM, mais il n'a pas marqué et l'affaire a dû aller jusqu'en prolongation. Là, entre deux coups d'éclat signés Aubameyang, Marseille a encore dû compter ses hommes.Fourbus, Samuel Gigot et Amine Harit ont ainsi laissé leurs places aux jeunes Raimane Daou et Gaël Lafont, connus seulement de quelques suiveurs très assidus de l'équipe de N3 entraînée par Jean-Pierre Papin et du championnat U19.Ils ont rempli leur rôle et la suite, les tirs au but, a donc appartenu à l'OM et à son incroyable public, qui a encore un rendez-vous avec l'Europe, le 2 mai face à l'Atalanta Bergame pour la demi-finale aller. D'ici-là, l'OM a trois matchs de L1 à jouer. Mais jeudi soir, sa 9e place en championnat était très loin.
